languages.text: "Вольный Торговец прав{mf||а}. Если Арбитр посмел отойти от Лекса, то, значит, он никогда не был арбитром. Вина лежит на мне за то, что я не углядел слабости в его сердце вовремя".
"The Rogue Trader is right. If the Arbitrator has dared to stray from the Lex, then he never was an Arbitrator. The fault lies with me for not seeing the weakness in his heart in time."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец прав{mf||а}. Если Арбитр посмел отойти от Лекса, то, значит, он никогда не был арбитром. Вина лежит на мне за то, что я не углядел слабости в его сердце вовремя".

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader is right. If the Arbitrator has dared to stray from the Lex, then he never was an Arbitrator. The fault lies with me for not seeing the weakness in his heart in time."
"The Rogue Trader is right. If the Arbitrator has dared to stray from the Lex, then he never was an Arbitrator. The fault lies with me for not seeing the weakness in his heart in time."

"The Rogue Trader is right. If the Arbitrator has dared to stray from the Lex, then he never was an Arbitrator. The fault lies with me for not seeing the weakness in his heart in time."

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat recht. Wenn der Arbitrator vom Lex abgewichen ist, war er nie ein Arbitrator. Die Schuld liegt bei mir, weil ich die Schwäche in seinem Herzen nicht rechtzeitig erkannt habe."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is right. If the Arbitrator has dared to stray from the Lex, then he never was an Arbitrator. The fault lies with me for not seeing the weakness in his heart in time."

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat recht. Wenn der Arbitrator vom Lex abgewichen ist, war er nie ein Arbitrator. Die Schuld liegt bei mir, weil ich die Schwäche in seinem Herzen nicht rechtzeitig erkannt habe."

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a raison. Si l'arbitrator a osé déroger à la Lex, c'est qu'il n'a jamais été digne d'assumer sa fonction. La faute m'incombe de n'avoir pas su déceler à temps la faiblesse de son cœur. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is right. If the Arbitrator has dared to stray from the Lex, then he never was an Arbitrator. The fault lies with me for not seeing the weakness in his heart in time."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a raison. Si l'arbitrator a osé déroger à la Lex, c'est qu'il n'a jamais été digne d'assumer sa fonction. La faute m'incombe de n'avoir pas su déceler à temps la faiblesse de son cœur. »

languages.text: “行商浪人说得没错。如果哪个法务官胆敢违背帝国法典的教条，那他根本就称不上法务官。这一切过错都在我，是我没能及时发现他内心的弱点。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is right. If the Arbitrator has dared to stray from the Lex, then he never was an Arbitrator. The fault lies with me for not seeing the weakness in his heart in time."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人说得没错。如果哪个法务官胆敢违背帝国法典的教条，那他根本就称不上法务官。这一切过错都在我，是我没能及时发现他内心的弱点。”

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente tiene razón. Si un Arbitrator osa apartarse de la Lex, es que nunca fue un Arbitrator. La culpa es mía por no ver la debilidad de su corazón a tiempo».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is right. If the Arbitrator has dared to stray from the Lex, then he never was an Arbitrator. The fault lies with me for not seeing the weakness in his heart in time."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente tiene razón. Si un Arbitrator osa apartarse de la Lex, es que nunca fue un Arbitrator. La culpa es mía por no ver la debilidad de su corazón a tiempo».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーの言う通りです。もしアービトレイターがレックスから外れる勇気を持ったのなら、彼は最初からアービトレイターではなかったのです。彼の心の弱さを見抜けなかったのは私の責任です」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is right. If the Arbitrator has dared to stray from the Lex, then he never was an Arbitrator. The fault lies with me for not seeing the weakness in his heart in time."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーの言う通りです。もしアービトレイターがレックスから外れる勇気を持ったのなら、彼は最初からアービトレイターではなかったのです。彼の心の弱さを見抜けなかったのは私の責任です」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir haklı. Bir yargıcı, Lex'in kelamına sırt çevirmeye cüret ediyorsa zaten hiç Yargıcı olmamıştır. Kabahat, kalbindeki zayıflığı zamanında göremeyen bendedir."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is right. If the Arbitrator has dared to stray from the Lex, then he never was an Arbitrator. The fault lies with me for not seeing the weakness in his heart in time."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir haklı. Bir yargıcı, Lex'in kelâmına sırt çevirmeye cüret ediyorsa zaten hiç Yargıcı olmamıştır. Kabahat, kalbindeki zayıflığı zamanında göremeyen bendedir."
